name: WizMotion
description:
WizMotion

You're a wizard from modern times...

Cast spells as if you were unlocking your phone!

Thanks for checking it out! All kinds of feedback welcomed!

Controls:

Esc - Pause/Menu

A, D - Move Left and Right

W, Space - Jump (Has double jump)

Left-Mouse - Invoke spells

Check out the in-game tutorial.

Content (almost non-existent .. lol)

This is my first time doing a 48h jam, please overlook how there's nearly no content at all. Instead, check out the mechanics, I think it turned out all right.

Jam time-lapse

I've recorded my screen while I was a building up this game, I'll be compiling all the videos and making a time-lapse of it.

If you're interested in that, make sure to follow me on twitter, I'll be posting once it's ready. @alex_krens

This game is made for the Mix and Game Jam 2020, a 48 hours jam!
